s.text: Oreskes declined to tell him, of course, who the Times ' sources were.
At the moment it broke, Lewinsky was facing an imminent deadline for striking an immunity deal with Starr's office.
The paper had to report on the debate about where its leak had come from.
According to the Times story, which was attributed to "lawyers familiar with her account," Clinton summoned Currie to the White House Sunday, Jan.
According to the Times story, which was attributed to "lawyers familiar with her account," Clinton summoned Currie to the White House Sunday, Jan.
By casting Clinton's question to Currie as rhetorical, the Times ' source implied that he was asking Currie to lie to back up his version of events.
